name: Rob Martin
text: GIVE YOUR MONEY TO ANOTHER PLACE! 3 orders, 3 let downs. Place an order to get a call 30 minutes later saying they do not have the staff to fulfill. When they do have the staff, the food is cold and horrible. Probably why this franchise …More

text: Food not good . Ordered delivery wings were forgotten but waiting another 20 mins on top of the 30 some I already waited they brought wings soggy and nasty . Alfredo pasta was dry with not much flavor. Pizza wasn’t terrible if only it wasn’t pretty much sauce and bread . Driver was nice !

text: I've ordered from here now a couple of times and each time I've been thrilled with my purchase. I've gotten the mozzarella sticks, garlic knots, chicken parm pizza and the regular and all exceeded my expectations.

text: Parking is an issue in this strip mall. I don't understand why they would keep the Pizza Hut in the strip mall open and close the stand alone restaurant.

text:
Skimpy on the toppings!
